alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes; West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 8:28PM PST until February 28 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches at the mountain passes, and 2 to 6 inches in the mountain valleys. * WHERE...Cascade mountains and valleys of Snohomish and King Counties, including Darrington, Index, Skykomish, Stevens Pass, and Snoqualmie Pass and Cascade mountains and valleys of Pierce and Lewis Counties, including the Crystal Mountain Ski Area, Paradise on Mount Rainier, Ashford, Randle, and Packwood. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected between 6 AM to noon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes; West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes
